doc:
Daniel Stern (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daniel_Stern_(actor) 0 Daniel Jacob Stern (born August 28, 1957) is an American film and television actor, comedian, director and screenwriter. He is perhaps best known for his role as Marvin "Marv" Merchants in Home Alone (1990) and Home Alone 2: Lost in New York, Phil Berquist in City Slickers (1991), and as the voice of Adult Kevin Arnold on the television series The Wonder Years. Daniel_Jacob_Stern ( born August_28_,_1957 ) is an_American_film_and_television_actor , comedian , director_and_screenwriter . He is_perhaps_best_known for his_role as Marvin_"_Marv_"_Merchants in Home_Alone_(_1990_)_and_Home_Alone_2 : Lost in New_York , Phil_Berquist in City_Slickers_(_1991_) , and as the_voice of Adult_Kevin_Arnold on the_television_series The_Wonder_Years .
